name: ZeGame
description: ZeGame is a beautiful puzzle game with complex but rewarding puzzles in three dimensions. Discover the new surroundings in every world, each having their own unique look and feel.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows XP SP2+ Processor: SSE2 instruction set support Memory: 300 MB RAM Graphics: Intel 4000 Storage: 250 MB available space

reviews.review_text: The concept is simple and unique. The graphics are pretty much over welmed. And there is a good variety of mechanics. The best deature is there are no loading timers. you can skip the screens if you want what.
I absolutely recommend this game. The learning curve is well-thought-out, the visuals and audio mix well, and the custom level editor means that there is no limit to the possible content.
Awesome game, saw the tralier on YT so decied to buy, really glad i did.
A very nice game, it`s very relaxing 10/10
This is the best game ever, requires some brain power to solve the puzzle and the option to create own puzzle is just amazing!!! Definately recommend it to eveyone (WITH BRAIN). ;) Good Luck Jesper!
